message: I'm going to be in town in the afternoon on Friday. Since I won't be able to do sprints on Sunday/Monday I figured I'd try to set up some Friday hacking. If anyone's interested and going to be around let me know. Still working on a location. Will depend on the number of people. Any locals with location suggestions for a smaller group?
I'll try to bring the GR posse
Hanging out working over the install process.
